example.text: major rivals , Philip Morris Co. 's Miller Brewing unit and Adolph Coors Co. `` have been following a policy of continuous and deep discounting for at least the past 18 months '' on their premium brands , pricing their product as much as 25 cents a 12-pack below Anheuser 's Budweiser label in many markets
example.arg: major rivals , Philip Morris Co. 's Miller Brewing unit and Adolph Coors Co.
